room.label: foyer
room.title: The main foyer
room.description: This looks to be the main foyer. The front door is barricaded. Looks like I won’t be escaping through there. There is a large staircase leading somewhere; however it is barricaded with a lot of furniture. Well isn’t that odd.

activities.description: A coat rack with a few coats

activities.title: An umbrella holder
activities.description: Your usual umbrella holder. Nothing special.
